item.title: [GRA1][Network] - Network equipment homogenization
item.description:
Mar 29, 23:23 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Mar 29, 20:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Mar 21, 23:10 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/03/2023 20:00 UTC
End time : 29/03/2023 23:59 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, our teams are going to upgrade some network equipment to homogenize our network infrastructure related to Public Cloud.
